title: My accounts email has been changed and i cant rechange it please help!
body: i recently discovered while playing that my account was logged into so i got suspicious and i went to go change my password out of suspicion because i know nobody should have my info and i discovered that the email to my account was changed the old email should have been parodox.gaming@gmail.com or sharkbarkplaydough@gmail.com if you could confirm this i would like to change my accounts email back to its original before my password is possibly changed! If neither of these emails are the original email i dont know what email this belongs too just that its not mine

replies.body: Hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can! They'll be able to help out with any account related changes you need.
